options.content:
## Holistic Observability

Holistic Observability covers not only metrics from infrastructure and applications, it covers metrics, logs, traces, profiles and any other telemetry or data that is important for you and that you want to correlate.

## About this Web Shop Demo

 This is an example dashboard on how to correlate business data (MariaDB, MongoDB, PostgreSQL,...) with telemetry from infrastructure and applications.
 Each order in the web shop has a specific order ID. There's a free text field on the top of this dashboard, so you can copy/paste any order id from e.g. customer incidents, but you can also browse different orders by clicking on the order id of one of the top orders in the chosen time frame. Choosing a valid order id will automatically populate a few other panels as well as filter the logs down to those with the specific order id.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT uuid, avg(amount) FROM
(SELECT orders.cart_id, orders.order_uuid as uuid, orders.created_date, SUM(price*quantity) AS amount from order_table AS orders
JOIN cart ON cart.id = orders.cart_id
JOIN cart_item ON cart.id = cart_item.cart_id
JOIN product ON cart_item.product_id = product.id
WHERE  $__timeFilter(orders.created_date)
GROUP BY (orders.order_uuid)) AS t

SELECT avg(amount) FROM
  (
    SELECT orders.cart_id, cart.customer_id as cust_id, orders.created_date, SUM(price*quantity) AS amount from order_table AS orders
      JOIN cart ON cart.id = orders.cart_id
      JOIN cart_item ON cart.id = cart_item.cart_id
      JOIN product ON cart_item.product_id = product.id
      WHERE  $__timeFilter(orders.created_date)
      GROUP BY (cart.customer_id)
  ) AS t

SELECT product.name, sum(cart_item.quantity) as amount FROM cart_item 
  JOIN product
  ON cart_item.product_id = product.id
  JOIN cart ON cart_item.cart_id = cart.id
  JOIN customer ON cart.customer_id = customer.id
  WHERE $__timeFilter(cart_item.created_date) 
  GROUP BY product.name ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT customer.name, sum(cart_item.quantity * product.price)
  FROM cart_item 
  JOIN product
  ON cart_item.product_id = product.id
  JOIN cart ON cart_item.cart_id = cart.id
  JOIN customer ON cart.customer_id = customer.id
  WHERE cart.is_deleted is false AND  $__timeFilter(cart_item.created_date) 
  GROUP BY customer.name ORDER BY sum(cart_item.quantity * product.price) DESC LIMIT 5;

panels.title: Top 5 Current Biggest Shopping Carts (Before Checkout)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT orders.cart_id, orders.order_uuid, orders.created_date, SUM(price*quantity) AS amount from order_table AS orders
JOIN cart ON cart.id = orders.cart_id
JOIN cart_item ON cart.id = cart_item.cart_id
JOIN product ON cart_item.product_id = product.id
WHERE  $__timeFilter(orders.created_date)
GROUP BY (orders.order_uuid)
ORDER BY amount DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT $__timeGroup(orders.created_date, '1m') AS time, count(*) AS amount FROM webshopdb.order_table AS orders
WHERE  $__timeFilter(created_date)
GROUP BY TIME ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT cart_item.id, quantity, price, product.name, customer.name AS customer_name from cart_item
JOIN cart ON cart.id = cart_item.cart_id
JOIN order_table as orders ON cart.id = orders.cart_id
JOIN product ON product.id = cart_item.product_id
JOIN customer ON cart.customer_id = customer.id
WHERE orders.order_uuid = "$order_id" AND $__timeFilter(orders.created_date)

SELECT SUM(quantity*price) from cart_item
JOIN cart ON cart.id = cart_item.cart_id
JOIN order_table as orders ON cart.id = orders.cart_id
JOIN product ON product.id = cart_item.product_id
JOIN customer ON cart.customer_id = customer.id
WHERE orders.order_uuid = "$order_id" AND $__timeFilter(orders.created_date)

SELECT cart_item.id, quantity, price, product.name, customer.name AS customer_name from cart_item
JOIN cart ON cart.id = cart_item.cart_id
JOIN order_table as orders ON cart.id = orders.cart_id
JOIN product ON product.id = cart_item.product_id
JOIN customer ON cart.customer_id = customer.id
WHERE orders.order_uuid = "$order_id" AND $__timeFilter(orders.created_date)

SELECT $__timeGroup(orders.created_date, '1m') AS time, sum(quantity*price) AS amount FROM webshopdb.order_table AS orders
JOIN cart AS cart ON cart.id = orders.cart_id
JOIN cart_item AS item ON item.cart_id = cart.id 
JOIN product ON item.product_id = product.id
WHERE  $__timeFilter(orders.created_date)
GROUP BY time ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT amount FROM
  (
    SELECT orders.cart_id, cart.customer_id as cust_id, orders.created_date, SUM(price*quantity) AS amount from order_table AS orders
      JOIN cart ON cart.id = orders.cart_id
      JOIN cart_item ON cart.id = cart_item.cart_id
      JOIN product ON cart_item.product_id = product.id
      WHERE  $__timeFilter(orders.created_date) AND cart.customer_id = (

        SELECT MAX(cart.customer_id) AS cust_id from cart_item
          JOIN cart ON cart.id = cart_item.cart_id
          JOIN order_table as orders ON cart.id = orders.cart_id
          JOIN product ON product.id = cart_item.product_id
          WHERE orders.order_uuid = "$order_id" AND $__timeFilter(orders.created_date)

      )
      GROUP BY (cart.customer_id)
  ) AS t

links.url: /explore?orgId=1&left={"datasource":"Loki","queries":[{"refId":"A","expr":"{traces=~\"process|root|span\"} != \"/order/\" |= \"http.status_code\" |= \"http.target\" | logfmt | http_status_code=~\"5..\" | http_target=\"${__field.name}\" | line_format\"Service: {{.svc}}, Endpoint: {{.http_target}}, HTTP status code: {{.http_status_code}}, Latency: {{.dur}}, traceId={{.traceId}}\""}]}

targets.expr: sum by (http_target)(count_over_time({traces=~"process|root|span"} != "/order/" |= "http.status_code" |= "http.target" | logfmt | http_status_code=~"5.." [5m])) / sum by (http_target)(count_over_time({traces=~"process|root|span"} != "/order/" |= "http.status_code" |= "http.target" | logfmt [5m]))

links.url: /explore?orgId=1&left={"datasource":"Loki","queries":[{"refId":"A","expr":"{traces%3D~\"process|root|span\"} | logfmt | http_status_code%3D\"${__field.labels.status}\" | line_format \"Service: {{.svc}}, Endpoint: {{.http_target}}, HTTP status code: {{.http_status_code}}, Latency: {{.dur}}, traceId={{.traceId}}\""}]}

panels.title: Request Rate and Error Count of $service

targets.expr: sum by (svc) (count_over_time({traces="span"} | logfmt | svc=~"$service" | http_status_code =~ "..." | http_status_code!~"2.." [1m])) / sum by (svc) (count_over_time({traces="span"} | logfmt | svc=~"$service" | http_status_code=~"..." [1m]))

panels.title: Span Count per 5 Minutes per Team
